manifest.name: Gourmet Chef Pack
manifest.author: Donegeon Team
manifest.description: Level up your cooking skills with advanced recipes and culinary challenges.

quests.title: Master a New Sauce
quests.description: Learn to make a new type of sauce from scratch (e.g., marinara, b√©chamel).

quests.title: Bake Artisan Bread
quests.description: Bake a loaf of bread from scratch.

quests.title: Cook a Three-Course Meal
quests.description: Plan and cook an appetizer, main course, and dessert.

quests.title: Explore a New Cuisine
quests.description: Cook a dish from a cuisine you've never tried before.

quests.title: Perfect Your Knife Skills
quests.description: Practice different vegetable cuts (julienne, dice, etc.) for 15 minutes.

quests.title: Meal Prep Sunday
quests.description: Help prepare ingredients or full meals for the week ahead.

markets.title: The Chef's Pantry
markets.description: High-quality ingredients and professional kitchen tools.

gameAssets.name: Golden Spatula
gameAssets.description: A legendary golden spatula for your avatar.

gameAssets.name: Michelin Star
gameAssets.description: A coveted Michelin star for your collection.

gameAssets.name: Fancy Cooking Class
gameAssets.description: A real-world reward: enrollment in a local cooking class.
